basics.name: Carlos Henriquez
basics.label: Front End Developer
basics.summary: Carlos is currently a Front End Developer at The Children's Place working on their e-commerce platform.

work.summary: Currently working on the future of E-commerce
highlights: Working in both new and legacy environments, supporting React JS and Vanilla Javascript.

work.summary: Work with the Deloitte IT Innovation team to create apps that eliminate manual processes within IT.
highlights: Developed tools using JavaScript, HTML5/CSS3/SASS, SQL, and PHP.
Developed an Asset Management tool that automates the laptop shipping process.
Took over development of Web App used by all internal IT in the US and India, that brings together all important end-user information by the swipe of a badge into one UI.

work.summary: Video Engineer Contractor with the General Services Administration (GSA).
highlights: Developed SQL reports, pulling metrics for leadership.
Maintenance of data, video streaming, content delivery, and network hardware systems.
Configured and installed various VTC units, streaming servers, VTC appliances, and media players.

work.summary: Developed internal sites used by School Staff to access student data using HTML/CSS, JavaScript, SQL DB and Quickbase.
highlights: Created a Responsive Frontend dashboard that displayed student data entry errors, making sure that the dashboard was compatible across all browsers.
Developed a Frontend account management system for User Account creations and modifications.
